Uses of Package
org.hibernate.dialect.function

Packages that use org.hibernate.dialect.function
Package
Description
org.hibernate.dialect.function
Contains implementations of SqmFunctionDescriptor describing a range of relatively-sophisticated SQL functions available in various dialects.
  • Classes in org.hibernate.dialect.function used by org.hibernate.dialect.function
    Class
    Description
    AbstractRegexpLikeFunction
    Base implementation for the regexp_like predicate.
    CastStrEmulation
    The HQL str() function is now considered a synonym for cast(x as String).
    CteGenerateSeriesFunction.CteGenerateSeriesQueryTransformer
     
    ExtractFunction
    ANSI SQL-inspired extract() function, where the date/time fields are enumerated by TemporalUnit, and portability is achieved by delegating to Dialect.extractPattern(TemporalUnit).
    FormatFunction
    A format function with support for composite temporal expressions.
    GenerateSeriesFunction
    Standard generate_series function.
    GenerateSeriesSetReturningFunctionTypeResolver
     
    HypotheticalSetFunction
     
    InverseDistributionFunction
     
    NumberSeriesGenerateSeriesFunction
    The base for generate_series function implementations that use a static number source.
    NumberSeriesGenerateSeriesFunction.NumberSeriesQueryTransformer
     
    RegexpLikePredicateFunction
    Oracle and SQL Server have a special predicate function.
    TimestampaddFunction
    The timestampadd() or dateadd() function has a funny syntax which accepts a TemporalUnit as the first argument, and the actual set of accepted units varies widely.
    TruncFunction
    Custom function that manages both numeric and datetime truncation
    TruncFunction.DatetimeTrunc
     
    TruncFunction.TruncRenderingSupport
